tool_description: The JSON Porn API will serve movies, clips and siterips of adult content. Be it through streams, torrents or direct downloads from well known file hosters.
name: JSON Porn
title: JSON Porn

api_list.name: Producers
api_list.description: Returns an array of porn producers or series.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: The number of entries you want

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of entries you want to skip

optional_parameters.name: producerId
optional_parameters.description: Will return only the entry with a matching producer key ID

optional_parameters.name: producerName
optional_parameters.description: Will return only the entry with a matching producer name

optional_parameters.name: includePorn
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, the API will also return one porn entry for each producer

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the sort of the result set. Possible values: "count", "date" and "alphabetical" (default)

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Endpoints to search for actors or porn entries. Returns an array of actors, porn entries and producers matching the search query.

optional_parameters.name: advanced
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, the query will operate a very long time but also return very good results. It will also look for actor nicknames and entry descriptions. If set to false, the query will be very fast but only find matches with String.startsWith(querry).

api_list.name: Images
api_list.description: Serves images by a given imageKeyId and resizes them as requested. If the requested image width exceeds the original width, the image will be served in its original resolution.

required_parameters.name: width
required_parameters.description: The maximum width of the image

required_parameters.name: imagekeyid
required_parameters.description: The image key id, as provided in actor or porn entries

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steppschuh-json-porn-v1.p.rapidapi.com/image/5817567562170368/400.jpg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steppschuh-json-porn-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steppschuh-json-porn-v1.p.rapidapi.com/image/{imagekeyid}/{width}.jpg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steppschuh-json-porn-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Porn
api_list.description: Returns an array of the latest porn entries.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of entries you want to skip

optional_parameters.name: pornId
optional_parameters.description: Will return only the entry with the matching key ID

optional_parameters.name: producerId
optional_parameters.description: Will return only entries that were produced by the producer with the given key ID

optional_parameters.name: pornType
optional_parameters.description: Will return only entries that are from the given type. Possible types are: Unknown (1), Clip (2), Photos (3) and Movies (4)

optional_parameters.name: includeImages
optional_parameters.description: Pre-fetches the image entries for each returned porn entry in addition to the imageKeyIds

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: The number of entries you want

optional_parameters.name: actorId
optional_parameters.description: Will return only entries in which the actor with the given key ID is starring

optional_parameters.name: genreId
optional_parameters.description: Will return only entries that contain the genre with the given key ID

optional_parameters.name: includeDownloads
optional_parameters.description: Pre-fetches the available download entries for each porn entry

api_list.name: Actors
api_list.description: Returns an array of actors matching your request. If you have an actor key ID, use only the actorId parameter. If you are looking for a name, use the actorName param. Keep in mind that the actorName matches using the .startsWith() function. If you want an advanced search (including actor nick names), use the /search/ endpoint. If you don't specify a name or an id, the endpoint will return all available actors in alphabetical order.

optional_parameters.name: includeImages
optional_parameters.description: Pre-fetches the image entries for each returned actor entry in addition to the imageKeyIds

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: The number of entries you want

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of entries you want to skip

optional_parameters.name: actorId
optional_parameters.description: The actor key ID of a known actor

optional_parameters.name: actorName
optional_parameters.description: The name of the actor you are looking for
